name: Genesia Legacy: Ultimate Domain
description: Successor of "old school" games, Genesia Legacy is a challenging and punitive turn-based strategy game, easy to learn but hard to master.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / + Processor: 2.0 GHz / + Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia 8600 / AMD / + DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
